# DmiProperty.SystemPowerControls.Month property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

BCD value of the month on which the next scheduled power-on is to occur, in the range 01h to 12h.

Key Composition

* Structure: SystemPowerControls
* Property: Month
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Byte

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey Month { get; }
```
